QuestData.Title: Empowering the Hourglass
QuestData.Description: The hourglass gives us glimpses into the streams of time we once walked as easily as a well-worn path.$b$bGather additional epoch stones, so that we may continue to use the power of the hourglass to delve into the mysteries of the timeways.$b$bThe future depends on it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Epoch Stones from creatures on the Timeless Isle.
